- At Orion Health, we're all
about re-imagining healthcare

to improve the experience for
both patients and clinicians.

Ensuring access to timely,
curated and validated information
is critical to this consumer experience.

When a consumer goes to
search for a condition,

what they really need is
one good trusted source.

So our flagship product
is our Digital Front Door.

Basically, it's designed
to help people navigate

the healthcare system, engage
with various technologies

across a unified patient
experience and consumer experience.

The purpose of the Digital
Front Door is to divert people

from an ER and to get them
the care they need rapidly
without having to clog the ER.
Orion is a longtime partner of AWS.
Amazon Kendra was a natural fit

for what we were looking for
and what we were trying to do,
and was a perfect centerpiece
for our new Digital Front Door product.
Kendra does, provides a perfect platform

for the purveyors of the
data to provide the data
they want to their patients and consumers.
All of these things we're talking about
are going to improve access.

They're going to improve
quality, and they're gonna,
you know, ultimately reduce cost.
That's all incredibly exciting,
incredibly exciting stuff to be part of.
